## Colin T. Stiles

[![GitHub Badge](https://img.shields.io/github/followers/colinstiles?style=social)](https://github.com/colinstiles?tab=followers)
[![LinkedIn](https://img.shields.io/badge/Linkedin-%230077B5.svg?logo=linkedin&logoColor=white)](https://www.linkedin.com/in/colin-t-stiles-gisp-386717292/)
[![Medium](https://img.shields.io/badge/Medium-00ab6c?logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,)](https://medium.com/@colintimothystiles)

Colin is a GIS professional that works across several industries to solve geospatial problems, including environmental, AEC, renewable energies, power delivery, linear networks, hydrology, telecommunications, and more.
